text: William Raymond Barry (October 4, 1928 â€“ August 28, 2018) was an American-born Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played 18 games in the National Hockey League. He also played for the Boston Bruins and the Hershey Bears in the 1951-52 season. Barry was born in Revere, Massachusetts and raised in Edmonton, Alberta. He died on August 28, 2018, in Calgary, aged 89.http://calgaryherald.remembering.ca/obituary/william-barry-1067857254 == References == == Other websites == * Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American ice hockey centers Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts Category:Sportspeople from Edmonton
